ConditionObject Class¶

class ConditionObject.ConditionObject¶

Bases: object

Conditions which govern playback in PlayStream

done = False¶

if playback completed

lock = <unlocked _thread.lock object>¶

threading Lock Object

pause = False¶

if paused

play = True¶

if playing

toggle_pause()¶

Toggle pause:

if self.pause == True: set to False if self.pause == False: set to True
